Properties.ProtectedString:
local function WaitForChild(parent,name) while not parent:FindFirstChild(name) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
local reloadTime = 8
local Tool = script.Parent
local freezeScript = WaitForChild(script,"FreezeScript")
local running = false
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") Tool.Enabled = true return end
Tool.Handle.FreezeSound:play()
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint
local direction = (targetPos - Tool.Handle.Position).unit local minRange = 3 local maxRange = 150
local hit = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(Tool.Handle.Position + direction * minRange, direction * maxRange), vCharacter)
if hit and hit.Parent then local humTarget = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humTarget and humTarget ~= humanoid then local freezeCopy = freezeScript:Clone() freezeCopy.Parent = hit.Parent freezeCopy.Disabled = false wait(reloadTime/2) end end
wait(reloadTime/2) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local duration = 4.5
local RightShoulder local LeftShoulder local RightHip local LeftHip
function moveJump() if RightShoulder then --RightShoulder.CurrentAngle = 3.14+math.random()-.5 RightShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 RightShoulder:SetDesiredAngle(3.14) end if LeftShoulder then --LeftShoulder.CurrentAngle = 3.14+math.random()-.5 LeftShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 LeftShoulder:SetDesiredAngle(-3.14) end if RightHip then RightHip:SetDesiredAngle(0) end if LeftHip then LeftHip:SetDesiredAngle(0) end end
local char = script.Parent
local hum = char:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = char:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if hum and torso then RightShoulder = torso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") LeftShoulder = torso:FindFirstChild("Left Shoulder") RightHip = torso:FindFirstChild("Right Hip") LeftHip = torso:FindFirstChild("Left Hip") if hum and torso then local anim = char:FindFirstChild("Animate") hum.WalkSpeed = 0
if anim and anim:IsA("Script") then anim.Disabled = true --hum.Jump = true moveJump() local startTime = tick() while true do --if hum then hum.PlatformStand=true end local time = tick() if time-startTime > duration then break end moveJump() wait() end if anim then anim.Disabled = false end else local startTime = tick() while true do local time = tick() if time-startTime > duration then break end moveJump() wait() end end
if torso then torso.Anchored = false end if hum then hum.WalkSpeed = 16 end
end
end
script:Destroy()

--By QuantumSama Tool = script.Parent
local checkConnection local userMouse
function CheckEnabled() if userMouse ~= nil then if Tool.Enabled then userMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else userMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end end end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end userMouse = mouse checkConnection = Tool.Changed:connect( CheckEnabled ) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if checkConnection then checkConnection:disconnect() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
